Test Name: SARS-CoV-2 and Influenza A/B RNA PCR
Specimen Type: Respiratory specimens (nasopharyngeal or oropharyngeal swabs, nasal swabs or washes/aspirates, bronchoalveolar lavage, tracheal aspirates)
Purpose: To detect and differentiate SARS-CoV-2 and Influenza Virus Type A and B RNA for accurate and timely clinical diagnosis and patient management using PCR.
Container: Viral transport medium (VTM) tubes for swabs/washes or sterile containers for BAL/tracheal aspirates
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, biosafety cabinet, centrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes with filtered tips
